title: Why is the solar nebula theory correct? - Quora

response.answer_text: All the planets orbit the Sun orbit in the same direction. Most of the moons orbit in the same direction. Most, not all, rotate in the same direction. this gives astronomers an indication that the solar system was started as a rotating disk of debris and dust around the sun during the early stages of the solar system. obviously, there are other possibilities as well for solar system creation like capturing wandering debris.
